dsmr.name: Add Dutch Smart Meter
dsmr.explain: This application can connect to a Dutch Smart Meter that communicates serial data via TCP/IP. Please specify the location of the meter in the network.

search.title: Searching for a Dutch Smart Meter on __addr__...
search.success: Found your Dutch Smart Meter. Device will be added.
search.failed: Unable to locate the Dutch Smart Meter on __addr__!
